FuncDef:
The dcn-instance command creates a DCN instance and displays the DCN instance view, or displays the view of an existing DCN instance.
The undo dcn-instance command deletes a DCN instance. The dcn-instance command creates a DCN instance and displays the DCN instance view, or displays the view of an existing DCN instance. The undo dcn-instance command deletes a DCN instance. By default, no DCN instance is created. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
